scripts.build: yarn workspaces run build && yarn lockfile-manage
scripts.dev: concurrently --names 'api,ui' 'yarn workspace infra-core-api run dev' 'yarn workspace infra-core-ui run dev'
scripts.lockfile-manage: synp --with-workspace --source-file yarn.lock && cp package-lock.json dist/ && rm package-lock.json
scripts.prettier: yarn workspaces run prettier && prettier --check tests/**/*.ts
scripts.prettier:write: yarn workspaces run prettier:write && prettier --write tests/**/*.ts
